sense.def:
Inspiration
je občutek vznemirjenja in navdušenja, ki ga dobimo ob novih idejah.

seg.quote: I have derived inspiration from Freud.

sense.def:
The inspiration for something
je tisto, kar da osnovno zamisel ali primer za nekaj, na primer za delo ali teorijo.

seg.quote: He became the inspiration for the comic strip character, Superman.

sense.def:
To get inspiration
pomeni nenadoma se domisliti nove ideje.
